email_text:
Subject: Important Notice: Loan Forgiveness Program Update

Dear Student Loan Borrower,

We are reaching out to inform you of an update to the Loan Forgiveness Program offered by the Department of Education. As part of our ongoing efforts to assist students in managing their loan debt, we are excited to announce a new initiative that may provide you with the opportunity to have a portion of your student loans forgiven.

Through this program, eligible borrowers may qualify for complete forgiveness of their federal student loans. This is a limited-time offer and we encourage you to take advantage of this opportunity as soon as possible.

To determine your eligibility and begin the application process, please click on the link below and enter your personal information. Our team of experts will review your application and provide you with further instructions on how to proceed.

[Phishing link]

Please be advised that this program is only available to borrowers who meet certain criteria, so it is important that you act quickly to secure your spot in the program. Do not miss out on this chance to alleviate the burden of student loan debt and start fresh with a clean financial slate.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at the Department of Education. We are here to help you every step of the way.

Thank you for your attention to this matter and we look forward to assisting you with your loan forgiveness application.

Sincerely,

The Department of Education Loan Forgiveness Program Team
